greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = SumOfDigits(n)^2 - SumOfDigits(n^2), where SumOfDigits = A007953.
comment: All terms are divisible by 9; see A069912 for the quotient. - _Ivan Neretin_, Sep 01 2016
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: f[n_] := Plus @@ IntegerDigits[n]^2 - Plus @@ (IntegerDigits[n^2]); Table[ f[n], {n, 0, 100}]
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 28 2002
ext: Edited by _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 04 2002
